message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would that be acceptable?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $17,000. I am willing to go up to $15,000. Would that be acceptable?
